summary: Adds 100 of each ingredient for alchemy.
descriptionHtml:
Adds 100 of each ingredient to your inventory. Make sure you are by a container when you use this, as you WILL be overweight.

There are two versions. 1 includes Crimson Ninroot (add-reagents) that automatically starts a quest pertaining to collecting them, so use this one at your own discretion. The other (add-reagentsnocrimson) doesn\'t include Crimson Ninroot, and the quest will not automatically be started, and you\'ll have to find it yourself. =P

I, for one, love alchemy, but I can\'t seem to find enough ingredients, and find the hunting tedious and not at all game-enhancing. I looked around the Skyrim Nexus,  but was unable to find anything, so I decided to make my own! Hope this helps all of you aspiring alchemists reach your goals. =]

TO INSTALL:
Simply extract to your Skyrim folder. (C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim) 

TO USE:
In game, press ` to open the console, and type \"bat add-reagents\" or \"bat add-reagentsnocrimson\" depending on which you decide to use, without the quotes. That\'s it! =]

I\'m horrible at modding, so these console command files are the only way I have to contribute to the Skyrim Nexus community. Thank you all who make mods for us! I wish I had better ways to repay you, but for now, this is what I have to offer. <3
author: Burasta

files.name: add-reagents
files.changelogHtml:
Removed Crimson Ninroot so quest isn\'t automatically started.
Added values to first three reagents that lacked 100 afterwards, resulting in not getting these three reagents.
